import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Base_Url } from "../config/config"; const Slider = () => { const [productList, setProductList] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const HEADER = { headers:{ "Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": 'Bearer ' + JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("token") ) } } useEffect(() => { setLoading(true); loadProducts(); }, []); const loadProducts = () => { axios .get(`${Base_Url}/allProducts`,HEADER) .then((result) => { console.log('res',result) setProductList(result.data); setLoading(false); }) .catch((err) => { console.log('loading',err.response.data) setLoading(false); //Swal.fire(err.response.data.error); }); }; return (
{ productList.map((item, index) => { return(

Featured Products

{item.productName}

$20

{item.description}

Add to cart

$32

); }) }
) } export default Slider
